name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Good Morning - New Tab by cloudHQ

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace your boring new tab page with an inspirational personal dashboard!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Good Morning replaces new tab page with a personal dashboard with images along with an inspirational daily quote to help you focus on the bigger picture of your day ahead.

Good Morning gives you a tranquil and positive way to start your day anytime you open a new tab in your browser. 

Good Morning is fully integrated with your Gmail and all cloudHQ Gmail tools: so you can easily access other cloudHQ features like Export Emails to Sheets, Save Emails to PDF, etc.

Here are your features:

• New inspirational photos and quotes everyday
• View your weather forecast for your city
• Easily access your Chrome Apps and bookmarks
• Easy access to the cloudHQ Chrome extension library
• Good Karma, an easy way to help you make a donation to the Red Cross 
• Integrated with Gmail and all cloudHQ Gmail productivity tools

We hope this positive tab will help you feel good before each journey you take online.

~~~How to use it~~~
1. Install this extension.
2. Open a new tab
3. Setup your morning message
4. Done

cloudHQ website: https://www.cloudhq.net/
App website: https://www.good-morning-tab.com/
Pricing: https://www.good-morning-tab.com//pricing
Support page: https://support.cloudhq.net/category/browser-extensions
Blog: https://blog.cloudhq.net
